item.title: The Cham wedding
item.description: The wedding for Albanians is a big family event with a lot of preparations. Marriage is a big burden on the family economy. Many families could not recover for years because of the huge expenses. No matter how poor the brideâ€™s family is, her dowry must be full. The customs of the Chams allow a kind of immersion in the world of this community. They carry with them the spirit and specifics of a population, bearer of a culture close to, but at the same time different from, the Albanian culture.
